mapper.select: SELECT PET_BOARD_CATEGORIES.CATE_NO, PET_BOARD_CATEGORIES.CATE_NAME, PET_BOARDS.BNUM, PET_BOARDS.BTITLE, PET_BOARDS.BCONTENT, PET_BOARDS.BHIT, PET_BOARDS.BDATE, PET_BOARDS.USERID FROM PET_BOARD_CATEGORIES LEFT JOIN PET_BOARDS ON PET_BOARD_CATEGORIES.CATE_NO = PET_BOARDS.CATE_NO WHERE PET_BOARD_CATEGORIES.CATE_NO = #{cate_no} ORDER BY PET_BOARDS.BNUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PET_BOARDS SET btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent} WHERE bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_BOARDS (bnum, btitle, bcontent, bhit, bstep, bindent, bgroup, bdate, userid, cate_no) VALUES (bnum_seq.NEXTVAL,#{btitle},#{bcontent},0, 0, 0, 1, SYSDATE, #{userid}, #{cate_no} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PET_BOARDS SET BHIT = BHIT + 1 WHERE bnum = #{bnum}
